703163f-a.text:
Bedford Avenue, at the southeast corner of Jefferson Avenue, showing Public School No. 3.

P.L. Sperr (photographer)

August 30, 1941

705114f-a.text:
Public School, Jefferson Ave., adjoining s.w. corner of Bedford Ave., B'klyn.

My 14, 1942

703162f-a.text:
Bedford Avenue, north from Jefferson Avenue. In the background is the Durere Great Cathederal.

P.L. Sperr (photographer)

August 30, 1941
